title: I am proud to announce to you the News!
description_text: I am bored, so i started programming around and it struck me... I should have my own news ticker! I need to keep you informed about the newest developments in my professional life. I learning new things, and broadening my skills. In the end, I would like to keep track of my achievements in a less boring way. ;)

title: A new start, who let the snakes out!?
description_text:
I have been looking for the perfect programming language for my personal needs for a very long time. I tried a lot but none had the versatility i wanted for my day to day programming.
At the same time I was looking for a way to teach my computer to react to speech commands and there it was the perfect opportunity to learn something new and realize my "dream of the moment" Mycroft!
So it is official now, i am learning python!

title: Hey Mycroft, turn up the volume!
description_text:
I have to say it was a very rough ride, but i got something working! I can now tell my computer to increase or decrease the volume :) or change the configuration of my displays moving from the table to the couch. I found a new way to support my lazyness and am pretty proud about it .. i thought i should share.
take a look at my ComputerHelperSkill
All thanks to the Mycroft team keep up the good work!

title: New skill unlocked! Wordpress administration
description_text:
Yay PHP! -.-'
My girlfriend is opening a new Blog, we are going to host it on the same server as this webpage. Feel free to visit: GiaGii

title: I am not that bad ..
description_text:
The semester is over. 3 exams out of 3 cleared!
My motivation is raising..

title: I am moving soon! (Servers)
description_text:
My contract is coming to an end. I am planning to get more power and storage to expand my world and learn new administration skills.
My new plans include packing all my software in docker containers to keep it simple. Gaining deeper knowledge of the reverse proxy nginx is also going to be a lot of fun.

title: The new plan is on fire!
description_text:
I feel like I am getting a new car :D
A V-Server just for me, 4 CPUs 6 GiB RAM and 500Gib SSD.
That's gonna be a lot of fun :)
I am ready for the release day, my docker images are warm and ready to start!
Visit my project: Dockerize !

title: Announcement! the new docker system is online!
description_text:
Docker is great, everything working like a charm.
Announcing the release of my new ecosystem :)
Administration Tools: Portainer
Media Server: Plex
Cloud Storage: Nextcloud
Collabora backend for Nextcloud: Collabora

title: Release: localMusicPlayerSkill for Mycroft AI!
description_text:
The tale of the voice commands continues, with the release of the new voice controlled music player for Mycroft! :)
Official post on the Mycroft Community Forum
Read the code Code on GitHub
All thanks to the Mycroft team keep up the good work!

title: User of the month!
description_text:
I was awarded a badge as new user of the month Apr '19! Thank you Steve Penrod and thank you Mycroft AI
My Badge :)

title: Django unchained
description_text:
I am proud to announce you, I learned a new framework: Django! It have to say it really is awsome. Fast and easy the way i need it, and using python adds to the fun.
I tested the framework by developing a small webpage holding useful links for my private needs. I started my ultimate online sandbox :D
Visit: myDashboard

title: The Walking web
description_text:
Crawling the web like a boss.
I finally can automate web searches the way i want to. The raise of the autobots is starting.. They see me crawling, they hating..

title: Plex Media Player Alpha release
description_text:
A new skill was born! Finally, owners of a Plex Media Server will have the possibility to use it with speech commands.
Welcome to the future!
Please Star or Contribute on GitHub or
Follow the release on the official Mycroft Community Forum

title: I am helping!
description_text:
Today is a good day :)
I contributed something useful and got added to the contributors Page :)
Go take a Look

title: Let's begin a new adventure
description_text:
A new first day at work!
Starting this new adventure at Device Insight got me quite exited, wish me luck!

title: I am the architect
description_text:
I did it! I passed my exam!
Now I am officially qualified as "AWS Solutions Architect"!
